Description: Book of the Dead of Tentameniy; sheet 9; vignette in black outline with some red detail.
Curator's comments: Fragments apparently of this papyrus are registered as EA 76474.

Mosher, Malcom Jr. 2016. The Book of the Dead, Saite through Ptolemaic periods : a study of traditions evident in versions of texts and vignettes (SPBD Studies), vol. I (BD Spells 1-15) and II (BD Spells 16, 18-30), Charleston.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (258)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57229) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57229)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2012 July - September, Tokyo, Mori museum, The Book of the Dead: Journey Through the Afterlife 2012, October - November, Fukuoka Museum of Art, The Book of the Dead 2013, May - September, Perth, Western Australian Museum, The Book of the Dead
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: bloom, loss, resinous deposits Black ink Red ink Pigment Backed: brown paper Loan to Japan 2012 'Journey through the Afterlife' exhibition. Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: Filmoplast T self adhesive linen tape Object Priority: A Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair
